page.title: 10Winterbourne Epitaphs
page.content:
These epitaphs were collected from St. Michael's parish church, Winterbourne. {1.A soldier who fell in the First War.
'No mother or father saw him die No sister or brother to say goodbye No friend or relation to clasp his hand But we hope to meet him in that promised land.'
{2.From the grave of a young mother. {(Died 1829)
'30 years I was a maid 13 months a wife 4 hours I was a mother & then I lost my life Behold my friend and cast an eye Then go thy way prepare to die Repent with speed make no delay I in my prime was called away.'
